name: Neo's Land : A New Beginning (Canceled)
blurb: High fantasy MMORPG where the community (that is you) provides content and has a direct say over the development and state of the game.

rewards.reward: LOVE PLEDGE ============================== If you ever wanted to make your own MMO game , we are giving you that opportunity now. For your donation of $10 you can know that you have just made it possible for all those players including yourself to have that opportunity to build their own MMO game.

FIRST SETTLER ============================== Be one of the first Settlers in the game and grab your claim on this new world. Settler rewards includes digital download of the game and exclusive First Group Early Bird Alpha + Beta  Access. ( estimated Alpha delivery in December 2013) !

FIRST ANNOUNCER ============================== Only available during Kickstarter, at all reward levels, your in-game avatar will receive acces to one of the Bronze titles only availible to players once they unlock certain in-game content. This title will be proudly displayed for all to see (title visibility controlled by player). Also includes digital download of the game and exclusive First Group Early Bird Alpha + Beta Access (estimated Alpha delivery in December 2013)!

FAMILY NAME ============================= Be known through the land by your last name. Secure your last name of your avatar before someone else takes it. Priority will be given to early backers.\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes First Announcer Rewards

EARLY NEWS ============================= Only available during Kickstarter, at all reward levels, your in-game avatar will receive access to one of the Silver titles only available to players once they unlock certain in-game content. This title will be proudly displayed for all to see (title visibility controlled by player). In addition, you will be privy to the game development progress before it is live! As concepts are created, screenshots are taken, and news is delivered for the game, they will be posted to a private Developer\u2019s Blog page to which you will have access (estimated blog access in October 2013). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Family Name Rewards

ATAVISM PLEDGE ============================== Get early access to the Atavism Online Engine and also be able to play the game to see how the engine performs. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes First Settlers Rewards

NO WORRIES ============================= Get a 4 month subscription codes ($40 Value) which you can use anytime after the game is released. This will give you a head start with out the worries. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Early News Rewards

DIGITAL COLLECTOR ============================= Get the full virtual experience with the Neo's Land Digital Collector\u2019s Edition! Includes digital download's of PDF Art Book, and Digital Game Soundtrack. You will also receive a digital map of the spawning explored continent available at start. (dependent upon reaching $0.5 M Extra Race! stretch goal there could be more than one)  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes No Worries Rewards

BLACKSMITH COLLECTION ============================= Want to craft items right from the start. get your blacksmith collection which will give you a medium Luther Forge, a medium Luther Blacksmith hammer and 5 random blueprints to craft.These items are exclusive for Kickstarter and will have a slow degrading enchantment on them so they will last longer.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Digital Collector Rewards

CARPENTER COLLECTION ============================= Lets tinker, get the carpenter collection which will have a Luther Medium Quality Mullet, Luther Medium Quality Chisel set and a Luther Medium Quality Working Bench when you start playing. These items are exclusive for Kickstarter and will have a slow degrading enchantment on them so they will last longer. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Digital Collector Rewards

MINERS COLLECTION ============================== Love mining, get your miners collection which will have a Ashers Medium Quality Mining hat, Ashers Medium Quality Mining Pickaxe and Ashers Medium Ore Bag when you start playing. These items are exclusive for Kickstarter and will have a slow degrading enchantment on them so they will last longer. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Digital Collector Rewards

HARD COPY ART BOOK ============================== Would like to have a hard copy of the Art Book then this is your reward. get one hard copy of the art book shipped to you on Launch Date. Along with this you will also get a exclusive hard copy of the game packaged in a special edition box with some goodies in it. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Digital Collector Rewards

PROFESSIONS COLLECTION ============================== If you are a crafter, gatherer and builder this is the package for you. not only do you get all the items in the Blacksmith,  Carpenter and Miners Collection but you also get two additional bags for your character to carry your resource

FIRST BUILDER TWO ============================== Be the first player to build your house in the game. With this pledge you will receive 36 tiles to build any design of a house that can fit on it. We will be releasing a map showing possible building location from which you can choose your tiles. When you login you will own those tiles already so no land rush. A tile is 4 feet by 4 feet. Location is based on first come basis so pledge quickly. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Professions Collection Rewards

FIRST BUILDER ==============================  Be the first player to build your house in the game. With this pledge you will receive 12 tiles to build any design of a house that can fit on it. We will be releasing a map showing possible building location from which you can choose your tiles. When you login you will own those tiles already so no land rush. A tile is 4 feet by 4 feet. Location is based on first come basis so pledge quickly. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Professions Collection Rewards

Developers Package ============================== Be the first developer to use our MMO Engine Atavism Online. Get Alpha and Beta access to the engine and start developing your own MMO game in Unity. You will also get all the game assets we release to the Unity Store and access to our closed developer forums for both Neo's Land and Atavism Online. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Professions Collection Rewards

Guild House  ============================== Be the first guild to build your house in the game. With this pledge you will receive 137 tiles to build any design of a house that can fit on it. We will be releasing a map showing possible building location from which you can choose your tiles. When you login you will own those tiles already so no land rush. A tile is 4 feet by 4 feet. Location is based on first come basis so pledge quickly. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Professions Collection Rewards

KING's LAND ============================== Be the King of your land and build your castle on a Island. With this pledge you will receive 576 tiles to build any design that can fit on it.You will be given a choice of 10 exclusive Islands and may choose one to build on. We will be releasing a map showing possible building location from which you can choose your tiles. When you login you will own those tiles already so no land rush. A tile is 4 feet by 4 feet. Location is based on first come basis so pledge quickly. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Includes Developers Package Rewards
